content: Write a paragraph about dolphins using exactly 75 words.

Dolphins are intelligent marine mammals known for their playful nature and intricate social structures. They possess a remarkable ability to communicate through a series of clicks, whistles, and body language. These charismatic creatures are found in various oceans worldwide and are often observed leaping out of the water or riding the waves created by boats. Dolphins are highly sociable and form strong bonds within their pods, exhibiting cooperative hunting techniques and displaying affection towards one another. Their intelligence and agility make them a favorite among marine enthusiasts and researchers alike.
